name: YouTube Simple Dark
description: A super simple dark style for YouTube that you probably don't want to use.
additional_info: A super simple dark style for YouTube that you probably don't want to use. Has missing features and probably affects some other Google sites when active (due to changing the apis.google.com domain used for YouTube comments). Suits my needs. Note: style 101409 is a much more advanced and better style for darkening YouTube. Highly recommended.
